title: 'There is a problem with your connection' Bug
body: get this message out of nowhere and no troubleshooting solved this issue, yet my internet connection is fine, I can watch youtube videos, Riot plz fix

replies.body: I updated the client and now sometimes it wont let me log into the game. when i do manage to get into the game then it comes up with a box that says that i need to restart or shutdown. this has happened 10-15 times now this is really annoying can someone send me a way to fix. my internet is working and i have Ethernet so it isn't a 'weak connection'

----This worked for me
fixed it by going to command prompt and running "ipconfig /flushdns" (Press Win+R for command prompt)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----If this doesn't straight up fix it
Go to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

and download the tool for windows or mac
Launch the tool
and select the following options
-Use Public (Recommended)
-Force Repatch

Than click start when the tool finishes close it
and
open command prompt and write "ipconfig/flushdns"
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This worked for me i did not come up with these just informing you guys i spent hours trying to fix this

+use hextech repair tool

+open legacy client via C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.admin
     = Legacy client says "RADS Error" "Cannot connect to HTTP Server."

**SOLUTION THAT DID WORK:
+Fixing the RADS Error via:
      http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3317974
      = NOTE: You must update the file by opening Notepad with Admin privileges (I used Notepad++ instead with admin priv)**
